## Question 1

```{r}
db <- airquality
db[!complete.cases(db), ]
```

## Question 2

```{r}
print("Temperature:")
mean(db$Temp, na.rm = TRUE)
sd(db$Temp, na.rm = TRUE)
min(db$Temp, na.rm = TRUE)
max(db$Temp, na.rm = TRUE)

print("Ozone:")
mean(db$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)
sd(db$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)
min(db$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)
max(db$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)
```

## Question 3:

```{r}
cars <- cars
Y <- cars$dist
X <- cbind(1, cars$speed)

beta_hat <- solve(t(X)%*%X)%*%(t(X)%*%Y)
beta_hat
```

## Question 4:

```{r}
model <- lm(cars$dist ~ cars$speed)
beta_hat2 <- model$coefficients
beta_hat2
```
